text: Salem Hempfest, or Salem Hemp Fest, is a cannabis festival in Salem, Oregon, in the United States. The inaugural event was held in Riverfront Park in 2015. ==References== Category:2015 establishments in Oregon Category:Annual events in Oregon Category:Cannabis events in the United States Category:Cannabis in Oregon Category:Culture of Salem, Oregon Category:Festivals in Oregon Category:Recurring events established in 2015
title: Salem Hempfest
